reviewText: I watch this EVERY NIGHT while in bed, it relaxes me. Danson & all the others actors are a great mix. Nobody else could play the role of Becker but Danson. He was better in this than in Cheers. It's funny, funny, funny! Buy it.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: Becker - a laugh out loud sitcom - he's rude, crude, and yet he has a big heart - and the supporting cast is funny - good writing and directing -This, in my opinion, is Ted Danson's best role.He exposes the crankie, cynic in us all.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: This season is definitely one of the best of the Becker series.  Over twenty episodes of Dr. Becker poking fun at one crazy member of society after another.  Great fun!!
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: I think Becker is a show that deserves appreciation from every angel. He is a practical man, that doesn't know how to hide his feeling and expresses them even if they are hurtful, actually, this is a good kind, because most people nowadays are two faces.This show is funny, and the chemistry between the characters is strong and makes it even funnier.Season 3 starts off with "The Film Critic"; which is funny and talks mostly about movie theaters and how people can't seem to find peace there. The season ends off when Becker tries to help his patient and advices him to go to the gym and even goes with him, but the patient has a heart attack and instead of thanking Becker he sues him, and Becker's practice would seem to be on it's way to end.You've gotta love this season, it digs deep into the relations between the characters, Bob becomes the Super and Reggie dating experience and Margret's husband relation.I miss those Sitcom days, where every episode used to be funny.Long live Becker.
summary: The show that changed many of our lives
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: This DVD is a riot. Becker is so crude and rude. The cast is amazing. Good for a good laugh.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: Another great season of the doctor whom everyone gets on his nerves.  I am always laughing when it comes to this show.  Becker and the gang never dissappoint.
summary: Becker? Please, I'm All About Becker!!!!!
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: Good writing and casting , always deilvers a more dry wit than belly busters ,certainly worth the money.I'll buy the rest of the series
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: Becker; was the best TV series for six years. I have purchased each season that has come out each year. I am not sure why Amazon or CBS does not bring the last three seasons out all this year, but this is my big wish.This program has the same political issues and work, family and friends that never get old or stale. It is a true ensemble show. As I watch it I always find something to laugh at.  I do not get any of these classic TV shows in my area so I really enjoy the DVDs.There is no extras so don't expect any frills, just fun. I highly recommend.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: This show is SOOOOOOOO funny!!!!!!! I already have seasons one & two and look forward to obtaining season four. Ted Danson is certainly versitile!
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: I only wish they weren't so long time in coming. I am looking forward to the rest of the seasons.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: This was a good show. Becker was grouchy at times, but he cared for his patients. Could always get a laugh when he weant to Reggie's. The characters were great!!
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: I pretty much cannot stand Ted Danson personally. I don't like his politics or just about anything else about him, but he is a very funny actor and this series is hilarious. I never watched it when it was on TV (because I don't like Ted Danson), but when the series ended, I walked in one day and my teenage son was watching an episode, so I sat down and grudgingly watched with him and was roaring with laughter. So now we're collecting the show on DVD and each season has been really great. Highly recommend this to anyone who wants to laugh.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: This is another funny season of what may have been the most politically incorrect sitcom of its time.  Becker has hit its stride by Season 3.  Highly Recommended.
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: A modern day curmudgeon.  A doctor who hates everyone, everything, everywhere and all the time (but with class)!  Funniest show since "All in the Family".
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: the dvd was very good quality, just what i was expected from a good quality dvd.  thank you
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: The DVD disk picture is very good except for the small white blocks at the very top of the screen that flash on/off.  Very distracting.  Was it a bad transfer to the DVD disks?
Title: Becker: Season 3

reviewText: Loved the show when it was on...missed it, so I purchased the first three seasons, not sure how long Becker lasted, but I will purchase the rest if the set!  My dad loved the show, I watch it for him!
Title: Becker: Season 3
